name: Instrumental Indie with Bird Music at DROM Taberna
description:
An indie-jazz trio local to Toronto, taking inspiration from traditional jazz trios and blending it with the jangly sound of contemporary indie music. Their repertoire features original songs, as well as interpretations of jazz standards, indie-pop tunes, folk tunes and other familiar favourites that they love. 

Featuring Dan Davidson on guitar, Henry Gouthro on bass and Taira Macdonald on drums.
